Package tage.input

Class InputManagerManager

java.lang.Object
tage.input.InputManagerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class InputManagerManager extends Object implements KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
This class handles all the input binding for actions and Java AWT Keyboard and Mouse Listeners in one place. It takes in all the data and exposes it in a ControllerState and a MouseAndKeebState object. It is up to the game to decide how to reconcile and process these states. All controller buttons are included int the controller state, but only keyboard keys I needed are included in MouseAndKeebState.
